text: So far many lion has been easy to use convenient they have some good features that I like. There are some things that I wish it would do differently that are more of a personal preference, I really don't want to shake the phone to get a little cash back every time. The instacash should be a large lump sum and I choose how much or how little I want to take of that at any point in time.

text: I feel like the app is not updated properly for some reason seems to have a two to three day lag and reports pending charges twice or not at all as it always has a different balance for my linked accounts then whats posted on their respective apps. Its a little off-putting to tell you the truth, but because of the "instacash"option, which i feel helps establish a more personal credit-type relationship between borrower/client and lender, i'll stick around, as Its saved my a** already on more than one occasion.  Support and trust like that from a bank or financial institute to a person in my situation is hard to find these days and i appreciate it.  I also appreciate the relevant yet not too overbearing partner ads.. Besides recoup they can prove to actually be useful to the  end user rather then just over inflate the click traffic solely for the developers profit margin... One day they'll be an honest, free, and truly helpful institution to hold and redistribute our money into the perpetuity that is capitalism, but until then i guess y'all stand with chime as the lesser of two evils.
title: You take the good with the bad i suppose...

text: I was in a tight spot when Covid came about and my electric bill got behind due to having to stock up on food and cleaning supplies to keep safe and things clean because of Covid.So one day i receive a 48 hr notice from the electric company i panic but I remembered I can use my Instacash from moneylion i went on the app it stated you have 300$ in Instacash I thought boy how privileged am I .luckily for me I switched direct deposit right on time.
title: What a privilege

text: This is one app I don’t regret downloading not only I was able to invest open an account plus they’re working on a credit card for its customers up to 5,000 credit limit which should be out anytime but on the same day I was able to borrow up to $150 From instacash.That might not seem much to most but it helped me at the time and once you pay back instacash you’re able to borrow from it on the same day.the only drawback is you’re only to borrow up to $50 at a time.Everytime  you borrow you must tip some extra dollars as well they say it’s for the instacash to stay up & running so tipping $5 extra won’t hurt a bit I recommend this app to anyone I’m glad I’m join and you will as well!!
title: This is one app I don’t regret…

reply.message: Hi there. Thank you so much for this awesome review! It’s members like you that help make MoneyLion ROAR! Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub. Additionally, tips are absolutely optional, and do not impact eligibility or availability, however, we encourage you support the community and we highly appreciate it! You see, it takes a big team here at MoneyLion to keep 0% APR Instacash running smoothly 24/7. So each time you take an interest-free cash advance, we'll ask if you want to leave an optional small tip. It's wonderful to see great folks like you leaving tips to support this empowering feature for all. Your participation will help us ensure that we can keep offering the product.  0% APR Instacash advances can continue to benefit you and as many members as possible. Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!
